text:
Scheduled for the first release (see https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/pull/189#issuecomment-43651495). The examples should be structured so that the user does can easily find what it is looking for.

Maybe a folder with "advanced examples" would be useful (amongst others).
Indeed, some examples are technical whereas some depict typical use-cases.
title: Organize examples
